newsitem.title: JAPAN: Sony hits record ahead of earnings report.
newsitem.headline: Sony hits record ahead of earnings report.

text.p: Shares in Sony Corp advanced for the sixth consecutive session on Thursday morning, hitting a new record high helped by early buying on expectations of a solid earnings report due out later in the day, traders said.
Sony's share price briefly hit 9,730 yen, above its previous lifetime high of 9,670 marked on Wednesday. As of 0035 GMT, the shares stood 90 yen higher at 9,720.
Its turnover of 1.019 million shares was the eighth-heaviest on the first section of the Tokyo Stock Exchange.
The earnings results are due at 0600 GMT.
